; General section examples from KiCad PCB files

; Complete general section
(general
  (thickness 1.6)
  (title "Example Board")
  (date "2024-01-15")
  (rev "1.0")
  (company "Acme Corp")
)

; Minimal general section (only thickness)
(general
  (thickness 1.6)
)

; General with some optional fields
(general
  (thickness 1.2)
  (title "Prototype")
  (rev "A")
)
